data.title: Bitcoin Meltdown: The Surprising Winner Rising From The Chaos
data.description: After a brutal crypto crash erased billions, investors are turning to stablecoins. See why Bitcoin fell, how Jamie Dimon views digital dollars, and what Web3 means next.
data.author: Robert Daugherty
data.keywords: Jamie Dimon,crypto crash,Bitcoin price drop,stablecoins,digital dollar,Web3 technology,JPMorgan blockchain,crypto market volatility,stablecoin adoption,digital finance trends
